query: SELECT c.id, c.title, c.slug, c.targetLanguage, c.pathNumber, c.status, c.totalModules, c.totalLessons, c.totalActivities, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM course_modules cm WHERE cm.courseId = c.id) as actual_modules, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM lessons l WHERE l.courseId = c.id) as actual_lessons, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM activities a WHERE a.courseId = c.id) as actual_activities FROM courses c ORDER BY c.id;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user cYPAHDVF1MZtM6S.6044338ada58 --database cwh3JmcrqYgAZTUAinEMzM --execute SELECT c.id, c.title, c.slug, c.targetLanguage, c.pathNumber, c.status, c.totalModules, c.totalLessons, c.totalActivities, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM course_modules cm WHERE cm.courseId = c.id) as actual_modules, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM lessons l WHERE l.courseId = c.id) as actual_lessons, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM activities a WHERE a.courseId = c.id) as actual_activities FROM courses c ORDER BY c.id;

rows.title: Path I: Foundations of Professional French (A1)
